config.query: SELECT STYLE_COLOURS.IMAGE_STYLEID AS STYLEID, facets.CATEGORY, facets.DESC_ENG, facets.DESC_FR, facets.UPD_FLG, facets.FKORGANIZATIONNO, facets.CHAR_TY_SUB_TYPE, facets.CHARACTERISTIC_TYPE_ID, facets.CHARACTERISTIC_VALUE_ID FROM ELCAT.STYLE_ITEM_CHARACTERISTICS_ECA facets INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS ON SUBSTR(STYLE_COLOURS.STYLEID,1,8) = facets.STYLEID
